$schema.title: JSON Schema
$schema.description: Reference to JSON schema of this config

password_constraints.description: List of RegExes for additional password constraints

password_min_constraints.description: Min number of password_constraints to match for password to be valid

password_constraints_message.description: Validation message if password constraints are not met

password_expiry.description: Number of days until password expires, or -1 to disable

password_expiry_notice.description: Show an expiry notice within this number of days before a password expires, or `-1` to disable

password_update_interval.description: Min number of seconds before password may be changed again, or -1 to disable

password_allow_reuse.description: Set whether previous passwords may be reused or not

user_info_fields.description: List of user info fields to include in JWT identity

logo_image_url.description: URL to a logo image to show in the login form

background_image_url.description: URL to a background image for the login page

customstylesheet.description: Filename of custom stylesheet placed next to regular style.css
